preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 6 g of Boron powder. 
 2. Measure 2 g of Indium. 
 3. Measure 20 g of Nickel powder. 
 4. Measure 1 g of Vanadium powder. 
 5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until homogeneous.
